name: Ballad of the Raven and the Wolf
name_original: Ballad of the Raven and the Wolf
description:
Game Description 

A foul presence has been twisting and devouring the wildlife of the Shivering Peaks - The Blight is spreading with an insatiable hunger. Only a hopeless Raven and a withering Wolf stand in its way - You. 

The Wardens of these Northern Lands… You must defend the Groveheart and restore it with Essence, while the Blight will stop at nothing to corrupt it - An ever on-going tug of war battle until either side wins. 

Brutal and dutiful, the Wolf is partially infected with the Blight, which she uses to unleash destruction on those who would disturb the peace of the Grove. 

Wise and watchful, the Raven is the eyes and ears of the forest, reshaping paths, slowing enemies and unleashing its fearsome companion on unsuspecting foes. 

Work together to unleash the fury of the wilds! 


Key Features 

● Clean visuals with an isometric camera, packed with action gameplay 

● Work together to defeat the ever approaching Blight 

● Play as the Wolf and defeat approaching enemies with fast combo-attacks, restore the Essence of Life back to the Shivering Peaks and unleash devastating Drop Attacks by working together with your partner

● Prevent enemies from reaching the Grove Heart, by changing their paths, slowing them, or knocking them back as the Raven
